name: statebot
description: Write more robust and understandable programs.
author: Conan Theobald <npmjs@conans.co.uk>

scripts.build:all: concurrently "pnpm run build:dev" "pnpm run build:prod" "pnpm run build:dev:browser" "pnpm run build:prod:browser" "pnpm run build:docs"
scripts.build:docs: documentation build src/index.js -f html -o docs/ --theme node_modules/documentation-theme-light ; ./fix-docs.sh
scripts.build:docs:watch: documentation build src/index.js -w -f html -o docs/ --theme node_modules/documentation-theme-light
